Title: Prohibits landlords from reporting a late rent payment to a consumer reporting agency
Summary: Prohibits any lessor or agent of a lessor from reporting to any consumer reporting agency.
LawCode: Amd ยง235-e, RP L; amd ยง26-412, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting landlords from reporting a late rent payment to a consumer reporting agency
